Title: Unforgettable
Actors: Poppy Montgomery, Dylan Walsh, Michael Gaston, James Hiroyuki Liao, Tawny Cypress, Jane Curtin, Dallas Roberts, Daya Vaidya, Kevin Rankin
Plot: Carrie Wells, a former NY Police detective, has a rare medical condition that gives her the ability to visually remember everything. She rejoins the force and uses her ability to solve crimes.
